Korah <><
 
Remember...Just going to church doesn't make you a 
Christian any more than standing in your garage makes you a car
 
Proud Momma to: Mario-18yrs and Isaiah-6yrs 
Enjoying Homeschooling my youngest
Check out my blog at: www.ourcrazyhomeschoollife.blogspot.com
                                
"Train up a child in the way he should go: and when he is old, he will not depart from it"
Proverbs 22:6
 
 Happy moments, PRAISE GOD. Difficult moments, SEEK GOD.
Quiet moments, WORSHIP GOD.
Painful moments, TRUST GOD. Every moment, THANK GOD.

~ Rick Warren ~

From: Debra Rossing <debra.rossing@...>
To: "'unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com'" <unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 15, 2012 5:54 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Thsnk you


 
> P.S. Is there an unschooling convention happening this year?

There are unschooling conferences in many places - where are you and where are you willing to travel to? Off the top of my head, there are regular annual conferences/non-cons (get-togethers just for fun) in TX, CA, MA, OH, TN, Toronto, and I think also in the UK and Australia - and I'm pretty sure I've missed some.

Deb R

messages.subject: Thsnk you
messages.msgSnippet: Hi to all that responded to my freaking out.  I needed that support, which like I said before is not available to me or I just don t know where to find locals
messages.messageBody:
Hi to all that responded to my freaking out. I needed that support, which
like I said before is not available to me or I just don't know where to
find locals with the same mentality. In my heart, I know all this, just
hard to keep focused when there isn't enough support.

I appreciate all the advise!
Loretta P.S. Is there an unschooling convention happening this year?
